Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 Herein , we present a new donor - acceptor alternative conjugated polymer , changing the alkyl chain in the diketopyrrolopyrrole segment of PDTP - DTDPP from 2-ethylhexyl to n-butyl.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PDTP-DTDPP (with alkyl chain of 2-ethylhexyl in the diketopyrrolopyrrole segment) |
| PDTP-DTDPP (with alkyl chain of n-butyl in the diketopyrrolopyrrole segment) |
